title: Thorpe tributes, Pope fills in for Stokes & The Hundred reaches its finale
description: Athers and Nasser pay tribute to their friend and teammate Graham Thorpe on this week's episode of the Sky Sports Cricket Podcast.They also look ahead to England men's Test series against Sri Lanka, and how Ollie Pope will take on captaincy duties in the absence of the injured Ben Stokes.Plus, they chat about The Hundred eliminators and finals as the tournament reaches its finale at Lord's.
author: Sky Sports

text: Athers and Nasser pay tribute to their friend and teammate Graham Thorpe on this week's episode of the Sky Sports Cricket Podcast.They also look ahead to England men's Test series against Sri Lanka, and how Ollie Pope will take on captaincy duties in the absence of the injured Ben Stokes.Plus, they chat about The Hundred eliminators and finals as the tournament reaches its finale at Lord's.
html:
Athers and Nasser pay tribute to their friend and teammate Graham Thorpe on this week's episode of the Sky Sports Cricket Podcast.

They also look ahead to England men's Test series against Sri Lanka, and how Ollie Pope will take on captaincy duties in the absence of the injured Ben Stokes.

Plus, they chat about The Hundred eliminators and finals as the tournament reaches its finale at Lord's.
